title: Intuitive Voice-Guided Navigation
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want an intuitive voice-guided navigation system so that I can easily manage my daily tasks without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: User-Controlled Data Sharing Preferences
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to have control over what personal and health information I share with ALFRED so that I can feel secure and respected regarding my privacy.

title: User-Centric Installation and Setup – Step-by-Step Voice-Assisted Process
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a simple and clear voice-assisted setup process for ALFRED so that I can easily install and configure the system without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Cross-Device Compatibility for Medication Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to receive medication reminders on my smartphone or tablet so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Cognitive Load-Reducing Interface Options
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want a simple and intuitive interface that reduces cognitive load so that I can easily navigate and use ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Flexible User Experience Customization for Enhanced Independence
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want the ALFRED system to offer personalized interaction settings based on my preferences so that I can manage my tasks more easily and feel more comfortable using the technology.

title: 24/7 Voice-Based Support Assistance
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want 24/7 voice-based support so that I can receive immediate assistance with my medication reminders, calendar management, and emergency situations without feeling overwhelmed by complex technology.
